title: Probing the continental margin
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Frank Bagnall and Greg Reading
brief_description: Describes the techniques of coring, trailing and seismic sounding used by scientists to survey and explore the mineral content of undersea landforms around Australia’s continental margin.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Frank Bagnall and Greg Reading
